purposeDescriptions.low: interrupts the current spell of any hit caster
purposeDescriptions.mid: interferes with magic, cancelling any current spells and fizzling any hit casters
purposeDescriptions.high: unwinds the threads of vis, cancelling any current spells and burning out any hit casters
purposeDescriptions.invLow: lenses vis to an area. Hit casters regain two vis in each pool
purposeDescriptions.invMid: strengthens the threads of vis. Hit casters become empowered and regain one vis in each pool
purposeDescriptions.invHigh: lenses and reinforces the threads of vis. Hit casters become empowered and may cast spells for only one sAP for the next few seconds
